Text: where the fuck is the English dub, asshole?

There is no english dub you ungrateful dumbfuck. These OVAs just came out this year, it took 3 years to get the anime dubbed and OVAs are rarely ever dubbed. Do your fucking research before you insult people giving you free shit assbag. Stop being a lazy piece of shit and read the damn subtitles on the video, the Japanese voice actors are way better anyway
